title: Squared SOS

A situation which poses an immediate threat to human life or health and requires urgent assistance.
Rescue and transportation services provided by municipal fire brigades and other organizations with comparable mandates
An emergency is a situation that poses an immediate risk to health, life, property, or environment.

description: SOS is the description for the distress signal in Morse Code. This emoji means SOS or “emergency”.
apple_vendor_description: The SOS button emoji on Apple devices is a striking symbol of urgent help, rendered in a vibrant, attention-grabbing red with a glossy, almost reflective surface. Its clean, circular design, typical of Apple's approach to icons, features stark white lettering that stands out boldly, emphasized by realistic lighting to create a sense of depth. The soft rounded edges of the button ensure it feels approachable yet immediately communicates its critical function for summoning assistance.
